item.title: Front-End Techniques for Optimizing Website Performance
item.description: Slow-loading websites can frustrate users, affect search engine rankings, and ultimately lead to loss of traffic and revenue. Front-end optimization is the key to ensuring a fast, responsive, and user-friendly website.

item.title: User and Algorithm Analysis - Instagram Advertisements
item.description: Looking into how Instagram filters its advertisement content for its variety of users and analyzing the ways users interact and respond to them.

item.title: Venmo â€” A Redesign Supporting User Reminiscence
item.description: We want to explore the role of social connection in the realm of mobile payment platforms. How can we redesign the Venmo Application to elevate in its mission to connect its users?
